category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 27 (Athletes Welfare Committee)
contents: Article 27 (Athletes' Welfare Committee) The Athlete's Welfare Committee responds to the chairman's advice on the following matters. 1. Matters pertaining to the direction of promotion for the promotion of athlete welfare 2. Matters pertaining to the establishment and implementation of a comprehensive plan for athlete welfare 3. Matters pertaining to athlete career support, welfare and benefit support, etc. 4. Other matters recognized as being in accordance with the functions of the Athlete Welfare Committee Matters to be discussed by the Chairman [This article was newly established on July 5, 2023]
